name: City of urd
description:
City of Urd

Majesty you are welcome to our humble island. We hope you can find your self a home here.

Your aim will be at least 5000 gold coins, 5000 food and 5000 fame, a peace of cake for such a royalty as yourself, no?

Well then, good luck!

Controlls:

Mouse

Click the buildings to build.

Right click to get rid of the building on your mouse.

No Audio Controll - sorry q.q.

Made in 1 Day.
